President Donald Trump 's longtime attorney Michael Cohen just received what [V: could] be a huge setback in his attempt to block Stormy Daniels ' attorney , Michael Avenatti , from appearing in the criminal case following the FBI raids on Cohen 's home , office , and hotel room last month .
